text: aebadt ma tushrikun biallah khayr 'am aldhy yrshdkm fi zulumat albari walbahr 'iidha dlltm fazlmt ealaykum alsbl, waladhi yursil alriyah mubashirat bima yrhm bih eibadah min ghayth yuhyi mwat alard? amebwd mae allah yafeal bikum shyyana min dhlk ftdewnh min dwnh? tnzzah allah wtqddas eamaa yushrikun bih ghyrh
